qualifier:
Unprotected call to method of un-annotated interface com.sun.jna.platform.mac.SystemB. Consider annotating the class with `@ThreadSafe`, adding a lock, or using an interface that is known to be thread-safe.
 Reporting because the current class is annotated `@ThreadSafe`.
